name: Ecolibrium (itch)
description:
Ecolibrium is a first person habitat management game, where you plant vegetation and create a balanced ecosystem that thrives.
With the theme of the game jam I wanted to create something to showcase climate optimisim and that our actions as humans can have a positive impact on our environment.

Use the Seed Plopper 3000 as your tool to plant vegetation, collect seeds and also fertilize your plants to keep them thriving for longer.

The aim is to achieve a perfect balance in your habitat, the game uses audio and visual cues as well as UI elements to indicate this to player. Planting a variety of plants will clear the level of the fog and make the sunshine.

Stay a while and listen and you might see the rainbow.
